snippet: “Extravagant Inventions: The Princely Furniture of the Roentgens,” at the Met, displays more than 60 pieces of the creative work of Abraham and David Roentgen.
abstract: Roberta Smith reviews exhibit Extravagant Inventions: The Princely Furniture of the Roentgens at the Metropolitan Museum of Art.
lead_paragraph: “Extravagant Inventions: The Princely Furniture of the Roentgens,” at the Met, displays more than 60 pieces of the creative work of Abraham and David Roentgen.

headline.seo: ‘Extravagant Inventions,’ Roentgen Furniture at the Met
headline.main: Where Marie Antoinette Went for Furniture
